text:
<@UD53A9UUR> <@U7SL518D6> Do you guys know of any updates to how hs sites are cached with cloudflare? Im noticing now that adding a query param on any hs site is no longer bypassing the cache. Adding hsDebug is. But the issue is that this version of the site then gets cached and displayed to visitors.

This is kind of an issue because  we def use hsDebug to sometimes display data objects to help with debugging variables. Not to mention sites that use query parameters to change the content of the page.

Any thoughts?
Does anybody know where can I post things related to the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/deals/create-custom-quote-templates-beta|custom quote templates>?

This is the best place to go
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Custom-Quote-Template-Beta/gh-p/cpq-beta#>
could you DM me the page you’re having this issue on?
Where can I get help on how to use the accounting extension api ?
I’m going to try it with webpack today. Hopefully to build a reactive search module
HubSpot should back Svelte and build it. If we could merge editable fields with Svelte that would be interesting…
Anyone know of a way to use Hubl if statements in Sass?

I forget the trick off-hand but basically what you need to do is make SASS ignore the HubL and print it to output CSS file. You may be able to find it by search in slack here.

It’s kind of a hacky trick but gets the job done.

<@U7SL518D6>
I've created <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Custom-Quote-Template-Beta/Identify-when-quote-template-is-in-quot-editing-quot-phase/m-p/479053#M241|this post> on the forum, can I also post it here in the <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel?
<@UP51JBCD9> might need to hold a master class in this :grin:

<@UD53A9UUR> The documentation needs improvement as well.
<@UP51JBCD9> Are you willing to help ?

I know of the one trick with doing like `/*{% set fallback_primary_color = '#1581f0' %}*/` But it doesn’t seem to work for more complicated things like involving if statements.
EDIT: Or maybe I flubbed it, seems to work fine now.
Are you able to create a workflow to send email when form is submitted?
HubSpot doesn't have a mail function like php so you have to use the tools available or try something external.
